name: 费利佩·蒙塔纳里
name_full: 费利佩·蒙塔纳里 Felipe Montanari
introduction: Montanari is a Brazilian polyglot actor who have played many roles in cinema, theater, streaming and TV world wide. After his first long length movie (O Caminho dos Sonhos - 1998) he went to Orlando Florida to work as a cast member for Disney and two years after that he was recruited as an entertainer aboard Costa Cruises ships where he stayed for 7 years and learned new languages, visited more than 30 countries and reached the position of Chief Entertainer with only 24 years old.Back on dry land, he hosted "The Style Lab" at Discovery Home & Health and reached prominence in his acting career when he played an FBI agent in a feature film with a famous Brazilian cast in "S.O.S. Mulheres ao Mar 2" (Universal Studios and GloboPlay) and gave life to a passionate motoboy in "Motogirl" (Amazon Prime Video). ), a highly-rated series that also became a feature film and is starring in the newest DisneyPlus series "Mila in the Multiverse". He's also the voice of many cartoon characters and locutor for several advertisement campaigns.He's happily married with Carmela Montanari, a self-esteem specialist creator of the "Inside Out Method", and they have a beautiful boy called Erico.
